name: Spiced Shrimp
ingredients: 1/4 tsp. each salt, pepper and nutmeg
instructions: Thaw shrimp and place in 1 1/2 qt. casserole dish. Cover and microwave on High 5-8 minutes or until shrimp are opaque, stirring 2 or 3 times. Do not overcook. Drain juices and set aside.
Melt butter in microwaveable dish. Whisk in flour, spices and milk. Microwave on High 3-6 minutes or until thick and bubbly, whisking 2 or 3 times. Pour over shrimp, stir and serve.
